channel.title: [Allstar] Custom Vengeance problem

item.title: [Allstar] Custom Vengeance problem
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

It works almost fine, it’s just that I can mass it when fighting someone so its constant hits on them, so the 30 second timer doesn’t work. Any help?
Also, if anyone needs to see anything else just ask.

case 162: boolean hasItems = playerHasItemAmount(557, 10) && playerHasItemAmount(560, 2) && playerHasItemAmount(553, 4); boolean hasLevel = playerLevel[6] >= 94; if (hasItems) { if (hasLevel) { setAnimation(4410); txt4 = "Taste Vengeance!"; attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); PkingDelay = 30; actionTimer = 30; inCombat(); deleteItem(557, getItemSlot(557), 10); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2); deleteItem(553, getItemSlot(553), 4); for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; if (PkingDelay <= 29) { sendMessage("You can only cast Vengeance every 30 seconds."); } } if (actionTimer <= 29) { sendMessage("You can only cast Vengeance every 30 seconds."); }

Read full topic
